Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where the game starts Links to playerShips and computerShips arrayList Obtains input from coordinateGenerator, fileIO, input, and validation
    Version:
    17/10/18
    Author:
    Raphael Suttiyotin

      Game()
      Default constructor Create shiplist (player and computer Create coordinate generator object Create validation object Create input object Create fileIO object (default setting and result filenames)

                                     boolean compVisible)

        Parameters:
        maxGridDimension - Grid width and height
        compVisible - Visibility of computer ship (true = visible)
